data.title: Hattingen Tourism
data.meta_description: It is the old town of the Ruhr region: Hattingen. The pearl on the Ruhr stands for the best quality of life with its historic, picturesque old town, the romantic Ruhr valley, its three castles and the green hilly countryside. Around 56,000 people from Hattingen can't be wrong.
data.text:
Hattingen

It is the old town of the Ruhr region: Hattingen. The pearl on the Ruhr stands for the best quality of life with its historic, picturesque old town, the romantic Ruhr valley, its three castles and the green hilly countryside. Around 56,000 people from Hattingen can't be wrong.
